name: stickman Revenge
description:
In Stickman Revenge, you play as a stickman seeking revenge against a group of enemies who have wronged you. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a variety of challenging levels and enemies, each with their own unique abilities and attacks.

Using quick reflexes and your trusty weapons, you'll need to fight your way through waves of enemies, using your skills and cunning to outmaneuver them and emerge victorious. Along the way, you'll have the opportunity to upgrade your character and unlock new abilities to help you on your quest for revenge.

With its fast-paced gameplay and intuitive controls, Stickman Revenge is a thrilling and satisfying action game that will keep you coming back for more by medoo and iden.
